mapper.select: SELECT ci.StoreID, SUM (ci.SalePrice * ci.SendQty) AS TotalAmount , SUM (ci.StockPrice * ci.SendQty) AS SaleCost , SUM (ci.SalePrice * ci.SendQty - ci.StockPrice * ci.SendQty) AS sumProfit FROM ClientPurItem ci LEFT JOIN ClientPur c ON ci.StoreID = c.StoreID AND ci.SheetID = c.SheetID WHERE c.CheckDate = #{clientPurItem.startDate} GROUP BY ci.StoreID
